jyoti_shete wrote:

> Is it possible to test the dependency or compatibility of Web based
> application with different browsers (IE x.x, Netscape x.x) using
> JUnit and HttpUnit framework?

For End-to-End Tests, HTMLUnit allows you to "pose" as different browsers.

For Object Tests, JsUnit allows you to test the Javascript you're using 
to differentiate browsers.

One more recipe for the book. :)
